thread.title: Rite Aid Shareholders Sour on Albertsons Deal

author: Heather Haddon
title: Rite Aid Shareholders Sour on Albertsons Deal

organizations.name: albertsons deal some rite aid corp.

text:
Some Rite Aid Corp. shareholders plan to oppose a merger with grocer Albertsons Cos. that they believe undervalues the struggling pharmacy chain.
Rite Aidâ€™s shares have fallen about 23% since the companies said they would merge on Feb. 20, a sign of deepening investor disapproval. Albertsons is closely held. Rite Aid said Thursday that same-store sales fell 1.7% in its fourth quarter, the sixth straight period of declines for the key metric.
